text: Peter Novick (July 26, 1934 - February 17, 2012) was an American historian. He was best known for writing That Noble Dream: The "Objectivity Question and the American Historical Profession and The Holocaust in American Life. The latter title has also been published as The Holocaust and Collective Memory, especially for non-US anglophonic markets. Novick was born on July 26, 1934 in Jersey City, New Jersey. He died on February 17, 2012 from lung cancer in Chicago, Illinois, aged 77. == Related pages == * The Holocaust ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:American historians Category:Writers from Jersey City, New Jersey
